name: Wizards On The Rocks
description:
WASD to move, Mouse to aim/shoot

Play as a wizard drunk with power. Casting spells and talking trash. All in the name of love! This is our team's 3rd game jam together! We hope you enjoy spell casting!

Five person team built out all music, code, and art assets from scratch, with some SFX from Freesound.org.
Music by Lafe King
Writing, Sound Design: (https://twitter.com/emenches) 

 Enemy Programming and Art: (https://twitter.com/froshiz)

Combat and System Programming: (https://twitter.com/gkgames)

Background and Resource Art: (https://twitter.com/mish_mash_masha) 

 Music Track: Lafe King (https://soundcloud.com/lakingmusic)

Dialogue System from: (https://twitter.com/evangraphicsguy) 

Post-submission Bugfix Changelog:

10/7/2021: Decreased distortion shader effect, fixed enemies spawning on player
